text: Outpatient claim for CPT 99213 (Established patient office visit) was denied due to lack of prior authorization. Diagnosis: Hypertension (ICD-9 401.1).
MRI scan CPT 70553 was approved. Patient had complaints of chronic headaches (ICD-9 784.0).
Claim for physical therapy CPT 97110 was denied citing non-covered service. Diagnosis: lower back pain (ICD-9 724.2).
Outpatient lab test CPT 80050 (General Health Panel) was paid in full. Diagnosis: Routine check-up (ICD-9 V70.0).
CPT 99395 claim denied. Annual preventive exam for adult male. Reason: claim outside coverage period.
